name: Rhythm Game Thing
description:
In Rhythm Game Thing you play as a Small Round Thing dodging Fast Pointy Thing and Cool Explody Thing. 

This game was made for the first Miz Game Jam

Special thanks to Nestorboy for helping me with the logo and brainstorming game ideas.

Music credit goes to Sawsquarenoise: 
http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com/

(I would've polished this more if it weren't for me slowly becoming smooth-brained)
